title: Won's notes
content:
# Won's notes
![](../assets/0.webp)

Hi, I am Won. I am a husband of a beautiful wife, father of two lovely children, avid hiker and camper, life-long learner who must try anything that interests me, senior software engineer at [[Microsoft]], and co-founder and software engineer at [[Apeak Corporation]]. 

This site is my learning experiment inspired by Andy Matsutak's evergreen notes and his way of using notes as tool for effective thinking. I am publishing these notes to create some pressure for myself to write quality notes. 

Here are some of my interests:

* [[Parenting]]
